name: The Best 'Little Mermaid' Quiz | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.correct: Arista & Aquata & Adela & Atina & Attina & Andrina & Alana & Adella
questions.explanation:
Arista & Aquata & Adela & Atina & Attina & Andrina & Alana & Adella.

	They are not seen or mentioned very much in the film.

questions.text: Who did the voice of Prince Eric?
questions.explanation:
Christopher Daniel Barnes.

	He played Greg Brady in 'The Brady Bunch Movie.'

questions.text: Which of Ariel's treasures did King Triton destroy first?

questions.explanation:
Purple.

	A very scary villainess, voiced by Pat Carroll.

questions.text: What color were the flowers that Ursula was carrying at the wedding?
How many moles did Ursula have on her face?
What was the name of the chef?
questions.explanation:
Louis.

	Voiced by veteran character actor Rene Auberjonois.

questions.text: What color are King Triton's eyes?
How many legs (including claws) does Sebastian have?
Name one of the two terms of endearment Ursula uses for Flotsam and Jetsam after Ariel kills them.
questions.explanation:
Babies & Poopsies.

	When Ariel kills them with the Trident, Ursula says 'My babies! My poor little poopsies!'

questions.text: What name does Ursula use when disguising herself as a human?
questions.explanation:
Vanessa.

	It is not something that is easy to catch. The priest mentions her name when he is about to marry her and Eric.

questions.text: Where does Scuttle listen to to see if Eric has a heartbeat after the shipwreck?
questions.explanation:
His foot.

	He thinks he knows so much about humans, but he really knows nothing! Scuttle was hilariously voiced by comedian Buddy Hackett.

questions.text: How many Oscars (Academy Awards) did 'The Little Mermaid' win?
questions.explanation:
2.

	For 'Best Song' ('Under The Sea') and 'Best Original Soundtrack.'
